hero.title: The BluePrint Series: A Fireside Chat with Rich Tu

introduction.title: INTRODUCTION OF THIS EVENT
introduction.description: Join us for an exclusive evening with Rich Tu, the award-winning designer behind the official NY/NJ 2026 FIFA World Cup poster, and a creative powerhouse known for his work with Nike, MTV, and culture-shaping campaigns across the globe.

agenda.title: WELCOME AND OPENING
agenda.description: Join us for an exclusive evening with Rich Tu, the award-winning designer behind the official NY/NJ 2026 FIFA

agenda.title: FIRESIDE CHAT WITH RICH TU
agenda.description: An intimate conversation exploring Rich's creative journey, design philosophy, and the story behind the FIFA World Cup poster

agenda.title: NETWORKING LUNCH
agenda.description: Connect with fellow designers and creatives over a curated lunch experience

agenda.title: Q&A SESSION
agenda.description: Open floor for questions and deeper discussions about design, culture, and the future of creative work

eventDetails.description: Presented as part of The Gradient's Blueprint Series, this fireside chat-moderated by Love Malone, CEO of The Gradientâ€”will dive into Rich's creative journey, his thoughts on where the industry is headed, and how design continues to shape identity, storytelling, and the future of culture.

faq.question: WHAT IS THE SCHEDULE FOR THE EVENT?
faq.answer: The event runs from 10:30 AM to 2:00 PM, featuring a welcome session, fireside chat, networking lunch, and Q&A. Check the agenda section for detailed timings.

faq.question: WHERE IS THE EVENT LOCATED?
faq.answer: The event takes place at Soho House in New York. The venue features multiple spaces including the ground floor, main stage, and rooftop terrace.
